title: Just got Perma banned as a new player....seriously?
body:
So I have only been playing League for a few months, I still don't know how a lot of the game works. A few weeks back I received my first ever ban for 13 days. 13 DAYS WOW! For toxic behavior, which yes I was being toxic but I also had a pantheon following me wherever I went all game and he took all my CS just because he didn't get mid lane. Now just 2 days after being unbanned I ended a game and everyone reported me because I did bad...it was my 2nd time ever playing mordikaiser, I wasn't toxic, I even have the chatlog and everyone was being way more toxic to me. Now I am perma banned...like is this serious? The report option is so badly abused if I can't be unbanned I think this game is a joke, I have NEVER played another game where your first punishment is 13 whole 
days...only to be followed up with a perma ban, this is just outrageous. I'm only level 26 too!

replies.body:
If you want to discuss your behavior it'd help if you posted those chat logs.

There are [4 tiers of punishment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/yFLxpAcV-qa-about-player-behavior-systems-chat-log-reviews-and-feedback), which you move up each time you are punished;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

Continuing to display negative behavior after a punishment may result in you moving up to the next step, especially if you do it immediately after coming off one. If you are confused as to what kind of behavior is considered negative you should come here to discuss it so we can help you before you end up banned, not after when it's too late.

For general guidelines on how you are expected to act, please refer to the following links;

[The Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/)

[Behavior Worthy of a Champion](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751874-Behavior-Worthy-of-a-Champion)
Let's see the chat logs for the permaban then.

Yeah, League has some pretty ridiculously strict rules when it comes to what Riot considers "toxicity".  And no, there is absolutely no circumstance where Riot will unban you if it was done by their automated system.
I have seen them unbban in cases where it was an error, and also lower punishments in cases where the punishment was too severe. Very rare due to how well the system works, but it happens.
In manual reviews, yes. But as far as the instant feedback system goes, Riot does not reverse those.

You may be confused, they do not reverse LPQ's. They do reverse bans and lower punishment tiers if the punishment was dealt out by mistake or was too severe respectively. Rare, but it happens.

It doesn't happen, because the IFS works through a tier system. Nobody is receiving what Riot would consider a "too severe" punishment because the only way for that to actually occur would be in cases of "extreme toxicity" (racism/hatespeech).

There have been times where the system skips people tiers in the absence of hate speech, racism, or anything similar. In those cases Riot has lowered the severity of the punishment. Again, errors are rare but they happen. The system is not perfect.
